item.description:
THE SING AND DANCE GROUP:WILL PRESENT A VAUDEVILLE STYLE SHOW FOR THE RESIDENTS OF INDEPENDENT LIVING, ASSISTED LIVING, NURSING HOMES, ADULT DAY CARE CENTERS, SENIOR HOUSING AND SENIOR CENTERS IN THE NEW HAMPSHIRE TOWNS OF BEDFORD,DERRY, HUDSON, LITCHFIELD, LONDONERRY, MANCHESTER, NASHUA, PELHAM, SALEM, AND WINDHAM.

IN ADDITION TO SINGERS, DANCERS, AND MUSICIANS, WE NEED VOLUNTEERS TO HELP WITH THE CANNED MUSIC AND TO ASSIST US WITH THE COSTUMES AND PROPS.

THIS IS A VERY PERSONAL REWARDING SERVICE TO THE ELDERLY RESIDENTS IN OUR LOCAL COMMUNITY.

WE HAVE SCHEDULED THREE REHEARSALS FOR OUR NEW SHOW: MAY 10TH, MAY 24TH, AND JUNE 7TH.

PLEASE CONTACT BARB/PEANUT FOR MORE INFORMATION AT 603-540-7467.
item.name: SING AND DANCE GROUP
